about_the_game:
Relive your bone-crushing hostile takeover of Galactoil through the medium of music, from the award-winning composer Mikolai Stroinski. The soundtrack comprises of 15 tracks from Attack of The Earthlings - that are truly out of this world!

Track List

1. The Hu-Man Cometh (03:35)
2. Remember Where We Parked (00:47)
3. Eyes Without Ears (00:50)
4. Entry Level Position (02:29)
5. Drills, Thrills & Kills (02:11)
6. Party Crasher (01:33)
7. An Experimental Phase (02:58)
8. Severing Ties (03:03)
9. Human Season (01:12)
10. Making A Killing (02:01)
11. Office Politics (01:01)
12. Chairman of The Board (02:28)
13. Hostile Takeover (01:07)
14. Under New Management (00:54)
15. Let’s Harvest (Victory Fanfare) (00:10)

Songs will be placed in a subfolder of your Attack of the Earthlings Steam install directory: ...Steam\steamapps\common\Attack of the Earthlings\

name: Attack of the Earthlings - Original Soundtrack
short_description: Relive your bone-crushing hostile takeover of Galactoil through the medium of music, from the award-winning composer Mikolai Stroinski. The soundtrack comprises of 15 tracks from Attack of The Earthlings - that are truly out of this world!
supported_languages:
English*, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Italian, Japanese, Korean, French
*languages with full audio support
